name: Shmup Demo
description:
A WIP shmup game with spellcasting elements.

Arrow Keys - Movement

Left Shift - Slowdown

Z X C V - Add spell element

//Only Z and V pure spells are implemented, works with 3 different levels each. (Z, ZZ, ZZZ, V, VV, VVV)

Space - Cast current spell

A - Spawn example enemy wave
